content.description: Party Systems in the United States
content.question: Which of the following statements regarding political parties is true based on the graphic?

choices.label: The Democratic Party has consistently favored statesâ€™ rights.
The Republican Party initially emerged as an antislavery political party.
Regional interests have not played a major role in any of the party systems.
The Democratic and Republican Parties were the two major parties during the First Party System.

content.answer: The Republican Party initially emerged as an antislavery political party.

topic.text: 5.4: How and Why Political Parties Change and Adapt
